titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3771) to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for research and improvement of cardiovascular health among the South Asian population of the United States, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5118) to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to prioritize the completion of the Continental Divide National Scenic Trail, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6929) to increase the benefits guaranteed in connection with certain pension plans, and for other purposes; and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3771) to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for research and improvement of cardiovascular health among the South Asian population of the United States, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5118) to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to prioritize the completion of the Continental Divide National Scenic Trail, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6929) to increase the benefits guaranteed in connection with certain pension plans, and for other purposes; and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-432, by Mr. Neguse.
Rule provides for consideration under structured rules for H.R. 3771, H.R. 5118 and H.R. 6929, and provides for one hour of general debate on each bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 88.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1254.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 193 (Roll no. 386).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 201 (Roll no. 387).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3771, H.R. 5118, and H.R. 6929.
